list.title: Open History Map
list.description: Open History Map is a project started in 2016 in Bologna with the aim of the creation of an Open Street Map of the past. I am president and software architect and developer for the project, using many amazing techs.

list.title: Open Fantasy Maps
list.description: Open Fantasy MAps is a project started in 2020 in Bologna based on the work of Open History Map with the aim of the creation of an Open Street Map of fantasy worlds.

list.title: Just Play Bologna
list.description: Just Play is a boardgame players association founded in the outskirts of Bologna. It is also a place where we are experimenting with software aided gaming, started during the COVID-19 pandemic

list.title: E-Dway
list.description: E-Dway is a bike sharing platform written in python, docker, angular and flutter. I am the lead architect and main developer of the platform.

list.title: Freelance work/Consulting
list.description: Send me a mail at marco.montanari@gmail.com for inquiries. My specialities are Data Science, Angular, GIS and geographic data management, python and web architectures
